short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Invade Twitter images with a Blue Archive Sechi-drawn student!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Uplift the gloom and doom of Twitter by Sechifying your feed with BlueSechi's famous Blue Archive character art.

An extension that adds BlueSechi drawings to most images on your Twitter feed.
[Now compatibile with Firefox]

Heavily inspired by chikenuwu's Sechify extension.
chikenuwu's Sechify: https://github.com/IsaacSohn/Sechify

GitHub page for this extension: 
https://github.com/jaym0h/sechify_twitter

-<CHANGELOG>-
v1.3
- Fixed a bug that disallowed users to copy or view images in new tab when selecting images.
v1.2
- Fixed some typos
v1.1
- Added Firefox compatibility.
